name: Deacon Marker
description: This trait marks The Deacon, used for certain dialog checks to keep things working right.  Seeing this is probably a bug.

name: Background Story Filter
description: This exists so that mage hunter NPCs spawned after Sofia's mission, if they end up recruited in the future and generate certain background stories, will refer to linking up with Johnathan instead of Sofia.

name: Fix Jonathan
description: This trait ensures that old versions of this NPC, on being able to access the mission chain, only versions citing the correct starter mission will be able to offer missions.  The old versions cited the wrong initial mission, turning what was supposed to be a clever compatibility feature into a terrible mistake.

name: Path of Sword and Hammer
description: You have been trained in Via Gladium et Malleo, a weapon art focused on preserving momentum and fighting multiple opponents, using your fury in different ways depending on your weapon of choice.

name: Fake Threshold

name: Paragon of The Veil
description: You have gazed deeper into The Beyond than anyone that still lives.  It has gazed back, and found greater purpose in you.  The living wind it calls its herald, and you its knight under oath.  You will unable to mutate beyond your current state by mundane means, as this would tie you to intruders that must be cast out...
//: The good news, you regen mana faster and vortices are friendly.  The bad news, HFBTV doesn't want you getting any more dependent on the blob (or worse, the Mycus) than you already are.  Side note, the sheer volume of one-note categories I have to define to make all this work annoys me to no end.

name: Dragonblood
description: Power by any means.  The Sanguine Order believed the Dragonblood Sacrament would make them powerful enough to survive the cataclysm, to rule over man and monster alike.  That you have survived this long just might prove them right.

name: Magic Sign: Agility
description: Powers from beyond have granted you power, that can grant a temporary speed and agility-enhancing effect.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Clairvoyance
description: Powers from beyond have granted you power, that can grant sight beyond sight temporarily.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Clarity of Blood
description: Powers from beyond have granted you a power that can protect against parasites and the Mycus.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Confuse Monster
description: Powers from beyond have granted you a power that can confuse nearby monsters.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Conjure Acid
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure sprays of acid.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Consecrate
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to subvert otherworldly influences on the environment, within your immediate surroundings.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Dampening
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to stave off radiation, and extinguish flames in your wake.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Conjure Flame
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a burst of flame, where you command.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Eclipse
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to bring forth wicked omens, gaining a temporary surge of power in exchange for permanent scars upon the land.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Elemental Burst
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure chaotic magic, blasting foes with elemental force.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Flame Armor
description: Powers from beyond have granted you power, that can grant temporary resistance to heat and smoke.  Direct contact with flame will still harm you.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Frost Armor
description: Powers from beyond have granted you power, that can grant temporary resistance to the cold.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Free Action
description: Powers from beyond have granted you power, that can protect against paralytic effects and other hindrances.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Healing
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to heal the body, though overuse may have consequences.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Insight
description: Powers from beyond have granted you power, that can grant a temporary boost to perception.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Light
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a temporary aura of illumination.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Lightning Ward
description: Powers from beyond have granted you power, that can grant temporary protection against electricity.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Might
description: Powers from beyond have granted you power, that can provide a temporary strength-enhancing effect.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Open Lock
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can be used to open locked doors.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Overgrowth
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to cause plants to spring up from nothingness.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Poison Armor
description: Powers from beyond have granted you power, that can offer temporary protection from toxic gas and other poisons.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Serpentine Shield
description: Powers from beyond have granted you power, a defensive effect that will summon shadowy snakes when you are injured.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))
//: ID for INVIS retained to not break stuff.

name: Magic Sign: Shockstorm
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to create a shockwave of lightning around you.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Summon Centipedes
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to summon scuttling abominations.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Summon Skeletal Dog
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to summon a skeletal dog.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Sundering Quake
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to topple structures, and bury them in rubble.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

//: ID retained to avoid load errors.
name: Magic Sign: Surge of Adrenaline
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to provoke an uplifting rush through the body.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Magic Sign: Ward Against Evil
description: Powers from beyond have granted you power, that can offer temporary protection against various anomalous effects.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

//: Note: value of Elemental Sign is 5, and value of Suppression is 2.
name: Mark of Embers
description: Inhuman power has granted you the ability to manipulate your elemental nature, including guarding further against heat as well as suppressing your inner fire.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

//: Note: value of Might is 5, and value of Revenant Blood is 4.
name: Mark of Instinct
description: Inhuman power has granted you the abilities pertaining to your inhuman nature, including a strength-enhancing spell, along with the ability to guard against parasites or other hazards.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

//: ID retained to reduce redundancy and avoid load errors.  Note: value of Infernal Flame is 3, and value of Summon Fiend is 4.
name: Mark of Hellfire
description: Inhuman power has granted you unnatural abilities, the power to conjure unholy flames and the power to summon ashen undead.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

//: ID retained to reduce redundancy and avoid load errors.  Note: value of Summon Dark Wyrm is 5, and value of Summon Jabberwock is 6
name: Mark of The Beyond
description: Inhuman power has granted you unnatural abilities, allowing you to summon strange creatures woven from the Beyond.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

//: Note: Value of Drain Life is 6, and value of Surge of Adrenaline is also 2.
name: Mark of The Hunt
description: Inhuman power has granted you abilities to further hone your lethality, in the form of life-draining magic and the ability to spark a surge of adrenaline at will.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

//: IDs for Arcane Blessings are reused to reduce the amount of obsolete JSON.
name: Sign of Alteration I
description:
"You must learn to shape your surroundings to serve your purpose.  In time, you will find your purpose as well."
Unknowable forces have given you a gift, that can conjure a shroud of darkness to conceal you.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Alteration II
description:
"You will carry my torch, exert my influence to serve our mutual goals."
Unknowable forces have given you a gift, that can conjure an aura of illumination.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Alteration III
description:
"You will move unbidden, no artifice will obstruct one who follows my command."
Unknowable forces have given you a third gift, that can manipulate locked doors.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

//: ID retained, effect changed as teleport is of more limited use.
name: Sign of Alteration IV
description:
"If your enemy seeks escape or refuge, you will learn to halt them."
Unknowable forces have given you a fourth gift, that can allow you to conjure barriers of light.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Alteration V
description:
"And if a foe would block your way, my messages can soothe what cannot be destroyed."
Unknowable forces have given you a fifth gift, that can allow you to pacify monsters.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Alteration VI
description:
"In time, you will play but one part in preserving this world, by driving off these intrusions.  It is my will."
Unknowable forces have given you a sixth gift, that can allow you to subvert otherworldly alterations afflicting the environment.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Augmentation I
description:
"You must be strong, not just in body but especially in spirit.  In time, you will be strong enough to face the end of all."
Unknowable forces have given you a gift, that can grant a strength-enhancing effect.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Augmentation II
description:
"You will face truths mortals are not meant to bear."
Unknowable forces have given you a second gift, that can grant sight beyond sight.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Augmentation III
description:
"You will learn to act without hesitation, to do what is needed for the sake of this world."
Unknowable forces have given you a third gift, that can grant a speed and agility-enhancing effect.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Augmentation IV
description:
"Persevere and you shall carry my banner to the highest peaks of your realm, even through greatest hardship."
Unknowable forces have given you a fourth gift, that can trigger an uplifting rush through the body.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Augmentation V
description:
"Take no pleasure in what you must do, but always find purpose in each act."
Unknowable forces have given you a fifth gift, that can grant a temporary life-draining effect.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Augmentation VI
description:
"In time, you will be strong in spirit, and never need to hide from that which mortals fear.  It is my will."
Unknowable forces have given you a sixth gift, that can grant temporary invisibility.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Destruction I
description:
"You will face many threats.  In time, they will be made to kneel."
Unknowable forces have given you a gift, that can stun monsters in an area around you.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Destruction II
description:
"Your enemies will suffer all the same evils they have visited upon this realm."
Unknowable forces have given you a second gift, that can conjure toxic gases at a desired location.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Destruction III
description:
"You will use my gifts with caution, for each is a weapon to set right what has turned wrong."
Unknowable forces have given you a third gift, that can invoke a storm of divine lightning.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Destruction IV
description:
"Bring judgment to our enemies, for they bring only suffering."
Unknowable forces have given you a fourth gift, that can blast an area with divine flames.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Destruction V
description:
"With a steady hand, you will strike true."
Unknowable forces have given you a fifth gift, that can bathe your enemies in bolts of lightning.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Destruction VI
description:
"In time, you will play a part in avenging these evils.  It is my will."
Unknowable forces have given you a sixth gift, that can unleash a blast of destructive energy.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Protection I
description:
"To serve me, you must learn to guard against many threats.  In time, you will have nothing to fear."
Unknowable forces have given you a gift, that can grant temporary resistance to corrosive effects.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Protection II
description:
"You will bear my mark of protection, for your body is a frail and transient thing."
Unknowable forces have given you a second gift, that can grant temporary protection from toxic gas and other poisons.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Protection III
description:
"You will face storms that would sweep away all you hold dear."
Unknowable forces have given you a third gift, that can grant temporary protection against electricity.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Protection IV
description:
"But your spirit shall face these trials as stone faces the flame, unyielding to the inferno."
Unknowable forces have given you a fourth gift, that can grant resistance to fire and smoke.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Protection V
description:
"There will be no storm, no blizzard, nothing will deter you when you heed my call."
Unknowable forces have given you a fifth gift, that can protect against cold.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Protection VI
description:
"In time, your service to me will see you safely through death itself.  It is my will."
Unknowable forces have given you a sixth gift, that can project a powerful protective force.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Summoning I
description:
"This is a sign of the fate that awaits your world.  In time, you must learn what will help avert this omen."
Unknowable forces have given you a gift, that can summon skeletal dogs.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Summoning II
description:
"You will witness more dire omens, foretelling your fate.  Do not fear them."
Unknowable forces have given you a second gift, that can summon a skeleton.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Summoning III
description:
"You will witness other interlopers, promising different paths to your world's survival.  They are false omens."
Unknowable forces have given you a third gift, that can summon a homunculus.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Summoning IV
description:
"With caution you will learn to read these signs, and call forth beings to answer their false promises."
Unknowable forces have given you a fourth gift, that can summon a horrifying thing.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Summoning V
description:
"Your omens will avert theirs, and your signs will reveal our enemies for what they truly are."
Unknowable forces have given you a fifth gift, that can summon giant centipedes.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Sign of Summoning VI
description:
"In time, you will bear my messages, and call forth heralds to guide others.  It is my will."
Unknowable forces have given you a sixth gift, that can summon vortices.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))

name: Scaly Patches
description: Part of your torso and arms have become covered in flexible scales, providing limited protection there.

name: Draconic Scales
description: A set of flexible scales and armored plates now covers your body, acting as natural armor.  Somewhat reduces wet effects.

name: Elemental Affinity
description: Your body feels abnormally comfortable around heat and flame, letting you tolerate its heat for longer, and reducing damage from fire.

name: Metabolic Resilience
description: Your body has adapted to prey upon the new life that infests this world.  It's not powerful enough to deal with undead flesh, but mutated meat is more tolerable to your system.  Albeit, not to your palette.

name: Inner Heat
description: A strange heat permeates your body, warming you up in exchange for a more active metabolism.  While you need to eat and drink more, you also find it easier to recover from physical exertion and mend wounds.

name: Inner Fire
description: That strange warmth deep within your body has grown more intense, and its effects have become more pronounced.  While you still need to eat and drink more, your stamina and healing have adapted in turn.  A strange glow can also be faintly seen in the back of your throat, lending an unnatural aura of menace to your every word.

name: Dragonfire
description: Your body has adapted further, exploiting the strange power that fuels your body.  You still need more food and water than normal, but the benefits are more pronounced relative to the drawbacks.  Activate to breathe short-ranged bursts of flame.

ranged_mutation.message: You loose a tongue of flame from your mouth.

name: Scaly Wings
description: You have a pair of large, scale-covered wings.  Your body is too heavy to be able to fly, and worse yet they seem to simply get in the way, preventing you from wearing any torso gear not made of fabric.

name: Draconic Wings
description: You have a pair of large, scale-covered wings.  While you are still unable to fly, your muscles have addapted to support their movements.  They don't encumber you as severely, and the resulting adaptation has improved your strength and stamina.

name: Curved Claws
description: You have sharply curved claws on the ends of your fingers, allowing you to make an extra attack when conditions favor it.  However, they do get in the way a bit, especially if you are wearing gloves.

name: Pointed Teeth
description: Your teeth have changed into an assortment of pointed mimicries of human teeth, allowing you to make an extra attack when conditions favor it.

name: Draconic Muzzle
description: Your jaw and nose have extended into a somewhat pointed muzzle, pointed yet fairly broad.  It lends itself to biting in combat and looks impressive, but prevents you from wearing mouthgear.

attacks.attack_text_u: You savagely tear into %s with your jaws
attacks.attack_text_npc: %1$s savagely tear into %2$s with their jaws

name: Scaly Hind Limbs
description: Your legs have been altered into a digitigrade structure ending in wickedly sharp talons, preventing you from wearing footwear and making it hard to walk, especially on rough terrain.  It's even worse if you try to wear anything over them.  On the plus side, you can kick with them rather effectively.

attacks.attack_text_u: You rake %s with your toe claws

name: Draconic Hind Limbs
description: Your legs have been altered into a digitigrade structure ending in wickedly sharp talons.  While you still can't wear footwear, your new legs have adapted to a bipedal structure, making them much less awkward.  Rough terrain is still a hindrance and they're better left uncovered, but you can move a bit faster on level ground.

attacks.attack_text_u: You rake %s with your toe claws

name: Scaly Tail
description: You have a long, thin, lizardlike tail.  It's flexible enough to help with balance a bit, and makes a serviceable whip.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.

name: Draconic Tail
description: You have a long, thin, lizardlike tail, with a few nasty-looking spikes on the end of it.  It doesn't help as much with balance anymore, but still makes a serviceable whip.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
//: Becoming less effective at balancing is intentional, spikes aren't as substantial as Spiked Tail but still impedes dodge bonus.

name: Swept-Back Horns
description: You have a pair of relatively short horns, sweeping and pointing backwards.  While they don't make very good weapons, and prevent you from wearing any headwear not made of fabric, they tend to get in the way of attacks aimed at your head.

name: Draconic Plating
description: You have grown thick, overlapping plates like scutes along part of your body, serving as sturdy natural armor.  Reduces wet effects a bit.

name: Cleansing Flame
description: You were sworn into an order known as the Cleansing Flame.  Whether a dutiful hunter or a renagade, wherever your loyalties now lie, your past may still be useful in the future.

name: Cleansing Flame
description: You were sworn into an order known as the Cleansing Flame.  Whether a dutiful hunter or a renagade, wherever your loyalties now lie, your past may still be useful in the future.

name: Sanguinist
description: You were sworn into an order known as the Sanguine Order.  Infamous and feared as you were among those who studied in secret, your past may still be useful in the future.

name: Keeper of The Oath
description: You were sworn into an order known as the Keepers of The Oath.  Whether or not He From Beyond The Veil still guides you, the oath you swore is eternal, and your past may still be useful in the future.

name: Arcanist
description: Though you studied the Beyond, you weren't directly associated with the major groups to gain infamy among your fellow scholars.  Still, your familiarity with the arcane may prove useful someday.

name: Arcanist
description: Though you studied the Beyond, you weren't directly associated with the major groups to gain infamy among your fellow scholars.  Still, your familiarity with the arcane may prove useful someday.
